description: A very well established, well marked trail. Addington Lookout is reached by following the signs indicating Lodge Trail, to Fern Trail, to Addington Lookout. The view overlooks the Pitt River; which is nice. A perfect trail for kids, running, or something easy.
directions: Minnekhada Regional Park can be accessed from Lougheed Hwy, heading North at Coast Meridian, and East on Victoria Dr; which becomes Quarry Rd. The Entrance for the Park is on the right.The Trail Head is well marked, and includes a map.
title: Minnekhada Regional Park- Addington Lookout
